title: Render with React
description: Learn how to use React's `render` method.
instructions: Below we have a blank component. Inside of the render method we want to return a <div> with the text Hello World!.
output_validator: new Function('outputWindow', 'var body = outputWindow.document.body; var text = body.innerText || body.textContent; return text === "Hello World!";');
author: Ben <ben.bj32001@gmail.com>
